items.preText: 5.15pm Welcome back for West Indies' chase. It will be a new opening partner for Shai Hope, with Chanderpaul Hemraj coming out. Kieran Powell has been dropped, remember. And Shakib has the ball in hand, so Bangladesh will open with spin again.
items.text: back of a length on off, no turn, swatted to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hemraj, 1 run

items.text: length ball on middle, slight turn on offer, but slow enough for him to go on the back foot and whip it to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: tossed up that time, on off, he comes forward and turns it away towards square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hemraj, no run

items.text: given some air outside off, but a tad short, and punched powerfully past cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hemraj, 2 runs

items.text: tossed up outside off, patted back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hemraj, no run

items.text: tossed up, dipping nicely on the batsman who stays in his crease and defends
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hemraj, no run

items.preText: Mark: "Sorry to the West Indies fans, but this looks likely to be another lost cause. I cannot see Bangladesh failing to defend 255." - plenty depends on how the openers negotiate these opening overs I think. Mehidy from the other end
items.text: tossed up on the stumps, he comes forward and drives it to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: My Bengali's not the best, but Mushfiqur seemed to be telling Mehidy that the ball would grip on this surface
items.text: loud appeal and given! Hemraj talks to Hope, and walks off. Angled into the batsman from around the stumps, drifts in goes with the arm to hit him on the pad. He might have thought it would turn, bat was beside pad in his lunging forward defense. Good call not to review, DRS shows three reds.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hemraj, OUT

dismissal.text: C Hemraj lbw b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 3 (6b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50.00

items.text: tossed up outside off again, Bravo drives to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: nicely tossed up again, but Bravo comes forward to meet it equally nicely, drives it to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: length ball, spinning back into the right-hander who goes deep in his crease to flick it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.preText: Arfaa: "I think BD are the only side in the history of ODIs to open with two spin bowlers despite having 3 frontline pacers in their team " - that might well be true
items.text: tossed up on middle, very full, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, no run

items.text: slightly flatter on a good length, turned towards midwicket again
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, no run

items.text: fuller, given some air, he picks it off his toes to mid-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, no run

items.text: flatter and too full, clipped to long-on off his pads
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: good length tossed up, draws him forward to stretch and defend
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: very full, he makes room and drives to mid-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.preText: Ramesh: "I don't understand what BD is going to achieve by opening with two spinners. They can win this match but will this work in World Cup? Shouldn't they try to experiment for World Cup ?"
items.text: fuller ball outside off, steered to point's right. He wanted a single but was turned down
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: comes forward to defend outside off, the ball trickles off the outside edge. Bounces well short of the lone slip, who stretches to his left to prevent runs off the ball
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: good length on off, he drives with the spin to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: good length on off, he comes forward to drive it, but straight to mid-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: drifts on the pads, and he stays back in his crease, allows it to come to him and turns it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length ball, drifting on the pads a tad, tucked towards short fine leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.preText:
Syed Kabir: "@Ramesh Why experiment??? We are trying to win this match and the series!"

sabquat: "@Ramesh, that's why 3 seamers are included in the team. Otherwise, there should be another spinner instead of Rubel."
items.text: given some air, outside off, he comes forward but the ball squirts towards point off the outside edge
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, no run
